Visible time range bounds for a specific timeline.

## Fields
#### `timeline`
Type: [`Utf8`](../datatypes/utf8.md)

Name of the timeline this applies to.

#### `range`
Type: [`TimeRange`](../datatypes/time_range.md)

Time range to use for this timeline.
